summary: Left without men in the dying days of the American Civil War, three women must fight to defend their home and themselves from two rogue soldiers who have broken off from the fast-approaching Union Army.
cast: Brit Marling|Hailee Steinfeld|Muna Otaru|Sam Worthington|Kyle Soller|Ned Dennehy|Amy Nuttall|Nicholas Pinnock|Anna-Maria Nabirye|Luminita Filimon|Charles Jarman|Zefir|Delia Riciu|Bogdan Farkas|Stefan Velniciuc
title: En defensa propia
